com.ihealth.communication.control

Class Hs4sControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.control.Hs4sControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceControl

    public class Hs4sControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeviceControl
    Public API for the HS4s bluetooth

    The class provides methods to control HS4s device. You need to call the device method, and then call the connection method

    If you want to connect a HS4s device, you need to call iHealthDevicesManager.startDiscovery(long) to discovery a new HS4s device, and then call iHealthDevicesManager.connectDevice(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)to connect HS4s device.

        insCallback - device callback

    • Method Detail

      • getOfflineData

        public void getOfflineData()
        Get the value of historical data in the Hs4s
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately.
        • After getting the activity data, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be ACTION_HISTORICAL_DATA_HS.
          • The keys of message will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)

      • measureOnline

        public void measureOnline(int unit,
                          int userId)
        Create measure connection
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately.
        • After getting the activity data, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be ACTION_LIVEDATA_HS and ACTION_ONLINE_RESULT_HS
          • The keys of message will show in the KeyList of the live action and KeyList of the result action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        unit - 1 kg;2 lb; 3 st
        userId - user identify number

      • init

        public void init()
        Initializes method
        • Used to create communication channels with HS4S.
        • Attention, this method calls after creating the Hs4sControl object.
        • In iHealthDevicesManager.createControl(BaseComm btct, String mac, String name, boolean needReadEE) method is invoked for the first time.
        Specified by:
        init in interface DeviceControl

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnect the device

        When the APP exit or need to disconnect, call the method

        Specified by:
        disconnect in interface DeviceControl

      • getUpDeviceControl

        public UpDeviceControl getUpDeviceControl()
        Get UpDeviceControl's implementation.
        We recommend not use this method, use iHealthDevicesUpgradeManager instead.
        Returns:
        UpDeviceControl's implementation
        See Also:
        iHealthDevicesUpgradeManager
